about_the_game:
The “Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 1” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Let your ears return to the mysterious town of Silver Creek Falls with this deep and ambient soundtrack.

Track List
01 - Silver Creek Falls
02 - Police Funk
03 - Haunted Prelude
04 - Abandoned
05 - Falling Leaves
06 - Invocation
07 - Conspiracy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 /8/ 8.1 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card capable of playing MP3s
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 /8/ 8.1 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card capable of playing MP3s
